Description:
You enter Halfman’s cabin. He is standing with his back to you, gazing through the large window of his room.

The captain seems to ignore your presence, giving you a potential chance to make the first move. 

The room has some debris, but it is in better condition than you expected. None of it impedes your path to Halfman, and you are confident you can reach him before he has time to react.
DescriptionAction: What will be your next move?

    "SSCRewardHealthFlat": 0,
    "SSCRewardHealthPercent": 0.0,
    "SSCRewardText": "It is easy to imagine that someone like Halfman is a crafty and cunning enemy, so you try to anticipate any of his ruses and opt for a defensive approach.\n\nHalfman realizes that you are not going to fall for his traps and is forced to reveal the cards he was hiding!\n\nHidden cannons open fire at your position, but thanks to your defensive formation, you are able to avoid any damage and prepare to counterattack!",
